title: Opinions on Kindred?
body:
What is your intake on the newest addition to the champion pool {{champion:203}}  ?

They're by far my most played champion along with the Kench since I started playing again and I'd like to hear some solid opinions/ have a good discussion about them /kindred/.

Personally my experience varies a lot depending on the enemy team composition or role I take /I mainly pick her in the Mid lane  or in the Jungle/.
